title: Computer Networks
description: Study of interconnected computing devices that exchange data and share resources using communication protocols. Includes network architecture, protocols, security, and performance optimization.

title: TCP/IP Protocol Suite
description: Core communication protocols of the internet. Includes Transport Layer (TCP/UDP) and Internet Layer (IP) protocols for reliable data transmission and routing.

title: Network Security
description: Protection of network infrastructure and data from unauthorized access, attacks, and threats. Includes firewalls, encryption, VPNs, intrusion detection systems, and security protocols.
